title: Strengthening Learning Design Competencies in Practice: High School Science Project-Based Learning Using Interactive E-Books

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Three or more scientific concepts can be explained by utilizing multimedia features in interactive e-books.
A report can be written applying interactive elements included in e-books to real scientific problems through PBL team activities.
Strategies for maintaining concentration when using digital learning tools can be developed and practiced.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
